element.default:
Shipment/Mailing of Documents: Along with tracking domestic shipments, the purpose of the Shipment Request form is to elicit information regarding documents containing technical data that is intended to be physically mailed or shipped to (i) foreign persons, including Canadian employees, or (ii) a foreign jurisdiction (including Canada). Information you provide regarding the technical data will allow Legal to determine whether the technical data is export-controlled. All export-controlled documents or data must be reviewed and approved by Legal PRIOR to export. For review, please email documents to Legal.
Shipment/Mailing of Commodities: Along with tracking domestic shipments, the purpose of the Shipment Request form is also to elicit information regarding commodities intended to be physically mailed or shipped to (i) foreign persons, including Canadian employees, or (ii) a foreign jurisdiction (including Canada). Information you provide regarding the items to be shipped will allow Legal to determine whether the items are export-controlled. The international shipment of commodities must be reviewed and approved by Legal PRIOR to export. Please add a line item for each separate commodity even if the items will be packaged together for shipment.
